# isButtonBordered

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the combo box displays a border.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isButtonBordered: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the combo box displays a border. For example, when displaying a combo box in a table, it is often useful to display the combo box without a border. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Setting Display Attributes

- **hasVerticalScroller**: A Boolean value indicating whether the combo box has a vertical scroller.
- **intercellSpacing**: The horizontal and vertical spacing between cells in the pop-up list.
- **itemHeight**: The height of each item in the pop-up list.
- **numberOfVisibleItems**: The maximum number of visible items to display in the pop-up list at one time.
